    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202616</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Poetry through Music: Santana's Smooth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie durch Musik: Santanas Glatt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poésie par la musique : Santana Lisse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Poesia com a música: Santana Liso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Poesia con musica: Santana Liscio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποίηση μέσω της μουσικής: Santana ομαλού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Poesía con música: Santana Liso</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson draws students into a study of poetry, using Santana's "Smooth" as an entry point.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion zeichnet Kursteilnehmer in eine 
Studie der Poesie und verwendet Santanas ", glatt machen" als 
Einsprungadresse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon dessine des étudiants dans une 
étude de la poésie, utilisant Santana "lissent" comme point 
d'entrée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição desenha estudantes em um estudo da 
poesia, usando Santana "alisa" como um ponto de entrada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione dissipa gli allievi in uno studio 
sulla poesia, usando Santana "liscia" come punto di entrata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα σύρει τους σπουδαστές σε μια μελέτη 
της ποίησης, χρησιμοποιώντας Santana "ομαλού" ως σημείο 
εισόδων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección traza a estudiantes dentro de un 
estudio de la poesía, usando Santana "alisa" como punto de entrada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
